reviewText: ... The BBC's "The World At War" Series, masterfully narrated by Sir Richard Burton and others. This tape Episode 9, covers the heroic, yet incredibly bloody, costly Defense of the Soviet Red Army, against the Nazi Invaders at Stalingrad, by far, the largest land battle, of World War Two, where the then USSR, lost 30 MILLION DEAD HUMAN BEINGS, on that Horrific Eastern Front of World War II, in which they the Soviets WERE our INDESPENSIBLE ALLIES, after all, against Hitler's demonic invasion.
